name: gSquare
description:
Originally published in May 2011 for the PSP Genesis Competition.

Help Bluz the square to find Rose and free her. Control gravity to get through more than 40 levels. Agility and reflection will be crucial during your trip, in various environments and new things to discover: ice, lasers, canons, gravity locks, destroyable objects, and more…

Music by c418 (from the Little Things album).

Controls:
- D-Pad: move
- X: jump
- L/R: change gravity, pressing both will invert it
- Start: pause
